com.ibm.dragonfly

Class SqlDirective

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.dragonfly.SqlDirective
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InsertRows, ReplaceColumn, ReplaceRow

    abstract class SqlDirective
extends java.lang.Object

    Abstract base class for all replace directives that are SQL based. This class implements the SQL processing used by the Insert and Replace SQL directives

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Mike Storey
    See Also:
    Template, Merge

    • Method Detail

      • getValues

        public abstract void getValues(Template target)
                        throws DragonFlyException,
                               DragonFlySqlException

        Get Values must be implemented by sub-class and is the execut the directive method

        Parameters:
        target - - Target Template Object
        Throws:
        DragonFlyException - - Empty Result Set - Data Source Error
        DragonFlySqlException - - Database Connection Error

      • getResultSet

        public java.sql.ResultSet getResultSet(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> replaceValues)
                                throws DragonFlySqlException,
                                       DragonFlyException
        Create and execute the query, returing the results set. NOTE: Close should be called when you are through with the result set!
        Parameters:
        replaceValues - - From/To hash used on the SQL Select Statment
        Returns:
        ResultSet - The result of the SQL Query
        Throws:
        DragonFlyException - - JNDI Data Source Connection Errors
        DragonFlySqlException - - SQL Database Errors
